testcase.name: EB-01 Fetch billers with valid auth
testcase.system-out: Given a valid x-vpc-key is provided.........................................passed When I send a GET request to fetch billers..................................passed Then the fetch billers response status code should be 200...................passed And the billers list should be present......................................passed

testcase.name: EB-02 Validate response format
testcase.system-out: Given a valid x-vpc-key is provided.........................................passed When I send a GET request to fetch billers..................................passed Then the fetch billers response status code should be 200...................passed And the response should be in JSON format...................................passed And the response should contain a data array................................passed

testcase.name: EB-03 Validate mandatory fields
testcase.system-out: Given a valid x-vpc-key is provided.........................................passed When I send a GET request to fetch billers..................................passed Then the fetch billers response status code should be 200...................passed And each biller should contain "id" and "name"..............................passed

testcase.name: EB-04 Multiple consecutive calls
testcase.system-out: Given a valid x-vpc-key is provided.........................................passed When I send 5 consecutive GET requests to fetch billers.....................passed Then every response status code should be 200...............................passed

testcase.name: EB-05 Response consistency
testcase.system-out: Given a valid x-vpc-key is provided.........................................passed When I send 2 consecutive GET requests to fetch billers.....................passed Then the responses should be consistent.....................................passed

testcase.name: EB-06 Missing auth key
testcase.system-out: Given no x-vpc-key is provided..............................................passed When I send a GET request to fetch billers..................................passed Then the fetch billers response status code should be 401...................passed

testcase.name: EB-07 Invalid auth key
testcase.system-out: Given an invalid x-vpc-key "INVALID_KEY_12345"..............................passed When I send a GET request to fetch billers..................................passed Then the fetch billers response status code should be 401...................passed

testcase.name: EB-08 Invalid HTTP method
testcase.system-out: Given a valid x-vpc-key is provided.........................................passed When I send a POST request to fetch billers.................................passed Then the fetch billers response status code should be 405...................passed

testcase.name: EB-09 Invalid endpoint
testcase.system-out: Given a valid x-vpc-key is provided.........................................passed When I send a GET request to an invalid endpoint............................passed Then the fetch billers response status code should be 404...................passed

testcase.name: EB-10 Empty biller list check
testcase.system-out: Given a valid x-vpc-key is provided.........................................passed When I send a GET request to fetch billers..................................passed Then the fetch billers response status code should be 200...................passed And the billers list should be a valid array (empty or not).................passed
